```{r setup, include=FALSE}
require(data.table)
require(tidyverse)
require(dplyr)
require(data.tree)
source("./_functions/_TreetoTable.R")
source("./_functions/_TabletoTree.R")
```

## Import SU table and BECv12 site series
```{r import data}
#SU.tab <- fread("./inputs/BECMster_V2020_2_SU.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
SU.tab <- fread("./inputs/ALLBECSU_2021_SU.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
SU.tab$SiteUnit <- sub("a$|b$|c$", "", SU.tab$SiteUnit)
SS.Forest <- fread("./inputs/tblBEC_SiteSeries_v12_new.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE) %>% 
  dplyr::rename(SiteUnit = SS_Label, SS_Name = SiteSeriesLongName, Type = `Forest-NonForest`) %>% 
  dplyr::filter(Type == "Forest"| Type == "Deciduous") %>% dplyr::select(SiteUnit, SS_Name)

SS.Forest$SiteUnit <- sub("a$|b$|c$", "", SS.Forest$SiteUnit)
SS.Forest <- SS.Forest %>%  distinct()
BECv12_SS <- SS.Forest$SiteUnit %>% as.character
BECv12_SU <- SU.tab[SU.tab$SiteUnit %in% BECv12_SS]
fwrite(SS.Forest, "./outputs/BECv12_Forest_SiteSeries.csv")
fwrite(BECv12_SU, "./outputs/BECv11_Forest_SU.csv")
#newSS <- fread("./inputs/new_SiteSeries_v13.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)##new units for analysis

```

## Create BECv12 SU from publication sorts
```{r read and merge original SUs from publications, message=FALSE}
read_plus <- function(flnm) {
    read_csv(flnm)# %>% 
        #mutate(filename = flnm)##include this line if source file name is desired in output
}

corr1_SU <-
    list.files(path = "./inputs/Correlation1_SU/",
               pattern = "*.csv",
               full.names = T) %>%
    map_df(~read_plus(.))

corr2_SU <-
    list.files(path = "./inputs/Correlation2Published_SU/xlsx_SiteUnitTables/",
               pattern = "*.csv", 
               full.names = T) %>% 
    map_df(~read_plus(.))
BECv12_SU <- rbind(corr2_SU, corr1_SU)
#BECv12_SU <- corr2_SU
BECv12_SU <- BECv12_SU %>% distinct()
BECv12_SU$SiteUnit <-  sub("a$|b$|c$", "", BECv12_SU$SiteUnit) ##converts phases to site series
BECv12_SU2 <- left_join(SS.Forest, BECv12_SU) %>% dplyr::select(PlotNumber, SiteUnit)
BECv12_noSorts <- anti_join(SS.Forest, BECv12_SU2) ### Accepted site series not found in any sorts
fwrite(BECv12_SU2, "./outputs/BECv12_Forest_SU.csv")

BECv13_SU <-     list.files(path = "./inputs/BECv13_SU/",
               pattern = "*.csv", 
               full.names = T) %>% 
    map_df(~read_plus(.))
BECv13_SU <- BECv13_SU %>% distinct()
fwrite(BECv13_SU, "./outputs/BECv13_Added_SU.csv")

plot.dups <- left_join(BECv13_SU, BECv12_SU2 )
plot.dups <- plot.dups$PlotNumber %>% as.character()
BECv12_SU2 <- BECv12_SU2 [!PlotNumber %in% plot.dups]
BECv13_SU <- rbind(BECv12_SU2, BECv13_SU) %>% distinct()

fwrite(BECv13_SU, "./clean_tabs/BECv13_Forest_SU.txt")

```

## Import a Vpro hierarchy tree and covert to matrix
```{r clean hierarchy}

SUhier <- fread("./inputs/BECv12_Forests_Jan2021_Hierarchy.csv")
### add any hierarchical levels not in hierarchy table
temp <- treeToTable(SUhier)
Hier.clean <- temp$table
fwrite(Hier.clean, './outputs/BECv12_Hierarchy_Matrix.csv')

```

## Check for plots for each SU

```{r plots per SU, echo=FALSE}

BGCv13_nplots <- BECv13_SU %>% count(SiteUnit) %>% distinct()##plots per SU
BGCv13_missing <- anti_join(SS.Forest, BGCv13_nplots ) %>% select(-SS_Name) %>%  distinct()

```

```{r check SU units in hierarchy}
SU_in_Hier <- full_join(BGCv13_nplots, Hier.clean)
Hier.clean2 <- SU_in_Hier[!is.na(n),] #removes both hierarchy units without site series and site series without plots
Hier.clean2 <- Hier.clean2 %>% mutate(Formation = ifelse(is.na(Formation), "NewUnitstoPlace", Formation)) # adds unplaced units into the hierarchy under NewUnitstoPlace Formation
Hier.new <- Hier.clean2 %>% select(-n) %>% relocate(SiteUnit, .after = last_col())
fwrite(Hier.new, './clean_tabs/BECv13_Hierarchy_Matrix.csv')
```


```{r reverse function to write hierarhcy back into Vpro format}
#Hier.new <- fread("./outputs/BECv13_Hierarchy_Matrix.csv")
levelNames <- c("Formation", "Class", "Order", "Suborder", "Alliance", "Suball", 
"Assoc", "Subass", "Facies", "Working", "SiteUnit")
Hier.new <- as.data.table(Hier.new)
testReverse <- tableToTree(hierWide = copy(Hier.new),levelNames)
testReverse$Parent <- ifelse(testReverse$Parent == 1, "", testReverse$Parent)
fwrite(testReverse, "./outputs/CleanedVPROHierarchyTree.csv")
```
